00036 // default functions for parser
00037 double drand(double x) ;
00038 
00039 class StdFunction : public UnaryFunction
00040 {
00041   Declare_base(StdFunction);
00042 public:
00043   const Nom& getName() const
00044   {
00045     return que_suis_je();
00046   }
00047 };
00048 
00049 class Sin : public StdFunction
00050 {
00051   Declare_instanciable(Sin);
00052 public:
00053   double eval(double x)
00054   {
00055     return sin(x);
00056   }
00057 };
00058

00109 class Ln : public StdFunction
00110 {
00111   Declare_instanciable(Ln);
00112 public:
00113   double eval(double x)
00114   {
00115     if (x<=0)
00116       {
00117         Cerr << "x=" << x << " for LN(x) function used." << finl << "Check your data file." << finl;
00118         exit();
00119       }
00120     return log(x);
00121   }
00122 };
00123 
00124 class Exp : public StdFunction
00125 {
00126   Declare_instanciable(Exp);
00127 public:
00128   double eval(double x)
00129   {
00130     return exp(x);
00131   }
00132 };
00133 
00134 class Sqrt : public StdFunction
00135 {
00136   Declare_instanciable(Sqrt);
00137 public:
00138   double eval(double x)
00139   {
00140     if (x<0)
00141       {
00142         Cerr << "x=" << x << " for SQRT(x) function used." << finl << "Check your data file." << finl;
00143         exit();
00144       }
00145     return sqrt(x);
00146   }
00147 };
00148 
00149 class Int : public StdFunction
00150 {
00151   Declare_instanciable(Int);
00152 public:
00153   double eval(double x)
00154   {
00155     return (int) x;
00156   }
00157 };
00158 
00159 class Erf : public StdFunction
00160 {
00161   Declare_instanciable(Erf);
00162 public:
00163   double eval(double x)
00164 #ifndef MICROSOFT
00165   {
00166     return erf(x);
00167   }
00168 #else
00169   {
00170     Cerr << "erf(x) fonction not implemented on Windows version." << finl;
00171     exit();
00172     return eval(x);
00173   }
00174 #endif
00175 };

00227 class Not : public StdFunction
00228 {
00229   Declare_instanciable(Not);
00230 public:
00231   double eval(double x)
00232   {
00233     if (x==0) return 1 ;
00234     else return 0;
00235   }
00236 };
00237 class Abs : public StdFunction
00238 {
00239   Declare_instanciable(Abs);
00240 public:
00241   double eval(double x)
00242   {
00243     return dabs(x);

00246 
00247 class Sgn : public StdFunction
00248 {
00249   Declare_instanciable(Sgn);
00250 public:
00251   double eval(double x)
00252   {
00253     return (x > 0) - (x < 0);
00254   }
00255 };
